sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-card>
        <el-table :data="tableData" stripe style="width: 50%;margin-left: 25%">
            <el-table-column prop="id" label="ID" width="100" />
            <el-table-column prop="cateName" label="题目类型" width="200" />
            <el-table-column prop="action" label="操作" width="200" fixed="right">
                <template v-slot="scope">
                    <el-button type="danger"
                               :disabled="scope.row.deleted == 0 ? false : true"
                               @click="handleStatus(scope.row.id, 1)">
                        禁用
                    </el-button>
                    <el-button type="success"
                               :disabled="scope.row.deleted == 1 ? false : true"
                               @click="handleStatus(scope.row.id, 0)">
                        启用
                    </el-button>
                </template>
            </el-table-column>
        </el-table>
    </el-card>
</template>

<script setup>
import {ref} from 'vue';
import axios from '@/util/axios';
const tableData = ref([]);
const initList = async () => {
    const res = await axios.get('/api/survey-cate/all');
    console.log(res)
    tableData.value = res.data.data.surveyCates;
}
initList();
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>

</style>
